Name: Idiot Brain Evolution
About the game: This is a casual and entertaining multiplayer game, with a little brainstorming. Playing with friends will be lot of fun, but if you are a lone wolf, you can also play one of these games and have fun. Play the game. Win a PS5! For players who participate in the game, it is possible to get rewards. The current tentative reward is one PS5 per month. For more information, please see the announcement. Game Features: Different game types, including card game, answering game and interactive game. Play with friends, or match other players. Support 1-11 players. Hundreds of interesting questions, including images and videos. Enrich knowledge and exercise the brain while playing games. Creative workshop items. Multiple categories, hundreds of entries. Welcome to download and upload. More Joy In the Game, Waiting For You to Explore! Translations in different languages come from the Internet, please give feedback in time if you have any questions.
